Max Da Costa.action: Asks the nun if the people from the space habitat are different from him.

Max Da Costa.action: Nods skeptically when the nun says the rich people are not different.
Max Da Costa.assessment: His skepticism suggests critical thinking but also a possible emotional distance or distrust toward the wealthy, which may reflect a protective or wary attitude rather than warmth.

Max Da Costa.action: Questions the nun about whether the people from Elysium are different from him.

Max Da Costa.action: Max goes back to scrubbing after observing the medical bay and the advanced health technology.

Max Da Costa.action: Max expresses a clear desire to avoid sickness and to go to Elysium to gain access to superior healthcare.

Max Da Costa.action: Expresses that the deportation and repatriation of humans is unfair ('It’s not fair').
